entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Pickering
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:14 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
